Distribution. Holarctic, temperate.Throughout the Russian territory from Kaliningradskaya Oblast to Primorye, Sakhalin Isl., Kurils. Outside Russia in Europe, Turkey , Transcaucasia, Kyrgyzstan ; Kazakhstan ; Mongolia ; Korea , China (excepted S and Taiwan Isl.), Japan ( Hokkaido , Honshu isl.), Nepal , N America.
